Stop Tailpiece. Color Cherry Sunburst. Weight About 8.27 Pound ( 3.75 Kg ). This is Used Guitar. The Strap pin has been changed to lock type. The clear coating of the head has deteriorated. It was manufactured 29 years ago. It keep excellent condition. The protective sheet has not peeled off the electric cavity plate. Fret edge binding etc... It is very polite making. From the body, the vibration of the sound is transmitted well. Please look at the Maple top. This Plane Top is very beautiful. You can see the birds eye maple top by view angle. All parts, all made in japan. This RLG has dignity of vintage guitar. Burny is Great ! About guitar play, Current state, the space between the strings and the frets is standard. Mounted VH-1 Pickups in Neck and Bridge. This VH-1 Pickup is excellence. And worldwide assessment is high. Official name is "Vintage Humbucker HISTORY". I feel the good distortion sound. It is a very comfortable pickup !! It is cleanliness. I polished with guitar exclusive polish, so it is in a very clean state. I after the finger board cleaning, painted beeswax. The aim is moisturizing and and protection. Current neck condition, very good ! roughly straight ! There is no problem with the Truss rod and it can be adjusted. Remaining the frets are 93% on average. You can play immediately after it is delivered to you. I was set new strings. Regular tuning. ( Inch : 009, 011, 016, 024, 032, 042 ) Guitar playing, is comfortable. All is working well. It is in a very good condition. The Truss rod Wrench is not included.
